title: Diamond Cascade Kangan Set - Sparkling Elegance
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut natural diamonds. The diamonds are of VS clarity and GH color
ensuring exceptional sparkle and fire. Features a high-polish finish for enhanced luster.
features: This Kangan set showcases a timeless cascading design, with diamonds arranged in a continuous flow of brilliance. Each diamond is individually prong-set, maximizing light reflection and creating a dazzling effect. The design seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with traditional Indian bangle styles, suitable for the contemporary woman.
colors: Predominantly rose gold with the icy white sparkle of diamonds
creating a warm and luxurious aesthetic.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of sophisticated sparkle to evening wear or formal events. A stunning piece for a bride during the muhurtham or for a special occasion like a seemantham.
description: Experience the epitome of luxury with this exquisite diamond Kangan set. The exceptional craftsmanship, coupled with the brilliance of the diamonds, makes this a timeless investment. The rose gold setting adds a touch of contemporary elegance, making it a versatile piece that can be cherished for generations. A testament to refined taste and enduring beauty.
